General.Name: Bluescape Opportunities Acquisition Corp
General.Description: Bluescape Opportunities Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities. It intends to focus on businesses in the energy and industrials sectors. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Dallas, Texas.
General.Address: 200 Crescent Court, Dallas, TX, United States, 75201
